channel.title: Pi Source Help
channel.description: Hey guys im coding a pi source this is only my 4th time coding a pi! im hosting this server and when i run it noone can join!! how do i add the ip in the source! i added the ip to the client but still don't work!! plz help

item.title: Pi Source Help
item.dc:creator: @mashamaru mashamaru
item.description:
@mashamaru wrote:

Quote from: mashamaru on April 06, 2011, 09:47:13 PM 
Hey guys im coding a pi source this is only my 4th time coding a pi! im hosting this server and when i run it noone can join!! how do i add the ip in the source! i added the ip to the client but still don't work!! plz help

Wow…

Portforward, No-ip, firewall exception.

wow ur super dumb i know how to do all that dumb ass i have hosted 4 server’s i just finished shutting down my 4th i had it up 100%for 4 months

Read full topic
